 */ // Wait for the deviceready event before using any of Cordova's device APIs.
// See https://cordova.apache.org/docs/en/latest/cordova/events/events.html#deviceready
// document.addEventListener('deviceready', onDeviceReady, false);
export var onDeviceReadyConfirm=function onDeviceReadyConfirm(){navigator.notification.confirm('我是测试下cordova-plugin-dialogs',// message
onConfirm,// callback
'测试DIALOGS',// title
['确定1','取消']// buttonName
);};export var onDeviceReadyAlert=function onDeviceReadyAlert(){navigator.notification.alert('我是测试下cordova-plugin-dialogs',// message
onConfirm,// callback
'测试DIALOGS',// title
'我知道了'// buttonName
);};var onConfirm=function onConfirm(buttonIndex){// 点击按钮后的回调
if(buttonIndex===1){alert('我点击的按钮是'+buttonIndex);}console.log(buttonIndex);};
